info: Version 8.25.0 brings full Cosmos (ATOM) blockchain integration and expands the CLORE ecosystem with ETH token support.
bugs: Kadena SpireKey Accounts: Implemented sending to SpireKey (r:) accounts with clear user messaging.
Veil Sending: Enhanced transaction building with proper UTXO handling and zerocoin conversion detection.
Various UI/UX improvements and stability fixes
General Cleanups: Package and copy refinements across the app.
features: Cosmos Hub Blockchain Support: Full integration including native ATOM coin with send/receive, USDC token support, WalletConnect for Cosmos dApps, manual IBC token import, transaction history, and news feed integration.
CLORE Ecosystem Expansion: Added ETH token support on the CLORE blockchain network.
FluxNodes Dashboard: Enhanced node management with new Start All Nodes functionality and improved individual node start dialogs.
